channel.title: Fantasy World v1.4 [317]
channel.description:
[img]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/831/1000wj.jpg[/img]
[b]With proud I present my next version of Fantasy World :D[/b] [b] I made a new skill, the quest skill. U raise in the skill by doing quests. (nooo u serious;)[/b] [img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/9218/73795926.jpg[/img] [img]http://img855.imageshack.us/img855/1795/49343840.jpg[/img]
[b]U have to have completed the beginner tutorial whats in the video of my last development post. Prob now one saw the video since now one commented..[/b] (if u still wanna look: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517951.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517951.0.html[/url]) [b]to be able to start the skill. (all the problems I still had with the tutorial (see in link) are now also fixed so thats done) U start off at the Lumbridge Guide what is also explained in the skill guide:[/b] [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/729/68088284.jpg[/img]
[b]All quests tell u where to start:[/b] [img]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/7415/34573027.jpg[/img] [b]But there are also hidden quest that u have to find out on your own.[/b]
[size=10pt][b]Why doing the skill?[/b][/size] [b]- it gets u rewards and possibilities. One quest gives u as reward a key after slaying 3 dragons, the key lets u enter Camelot Castle where the only dragon weapon shop is. U also need to have done the quest to enter so keys dont get sold. One quest gives a dragon axe that only can be obtained that way. I also added plague city, a bit a copy of rs to get the gasmask And also I have added a quest to make trimmed armour. [img]http://img835.imageshack.us/img835/4091/88647830.jpg[/img] After the quest u get as rewards some dyes. This is to bring trimmed armour as rares into the game. Another quest gives u the legends cape. Others that ive done already give u small rewards like money or some items. I have 12 quests right now (hidden and unhidden) Ill add 13 more.[/b]
[size=10pt][b]Other things I did:[/b][/size] [b]Adding more shops Added like 150 more npcs Fixed some client problems..again Started fishing base (I removed the old one since it was crap) Started Fletching Worked farder on slayer Upgraded thieving[/b]
[size=12pt][b]To do:[/b][/size] [b]Currently finishing all the quest, will still keep me a week busy After that making all the skills work. Adding more shops More npcs Usage of more areas and citys funpk donator system and stuff random events thinking about a hidden skill also thats all I can remember right now[/b]
[b]If u want to see my v1.2 to see more I did:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517647.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517647.0.html[/url] [b]v1.3 (also added at the top) for my beginner tutorial video and full cooking:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517951.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517951.0.html[/url]
[size=10pt][b]Credits:[/b][/size] [b]Delta (for the delta base.) iSkape (ripped base for a part.) Me (doing a lot a lot of stuff.) Rotne (creativity and ideas for my quests.)[/b]

item.title: Fantasy World v1.4 [317]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

With proud I present my next version of Fantasy World

I made a new skill, the quest skill.
U raise in the skill by doing quests. (nooo u serious;)

U have to have completed the beginner tutorial whats in the video of my last development post.
Prob now one saw the video since now one commentedâ€¦ (if u still wanna look: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517951.0.html)
to be able to start the skill. (all the problems I still had with the tutorial (see in link) are now also fixed so thats done)
U start off at the Lumbridge Guide what is also explained in the skill guide:

All quests tell u where to start:

But there are also hidden quest that u have to find out on your own.

[size=10pt]Why doing the skill?[/size]
- it gets u rewards and possibilities.
One quest gives u as reward a key after slaying 3 dragons, the key lets u enter Camelot Castle where the only dragon weapon shop is.
U also need to have done the quest to enter so keys dont get sold.
One quest gives a dragon axe that only can be obtained that way.
I also added plague city, a bit a copy of rs to get the gasmask
And also I have added a quest to make trimmed armour.

After the quest u get as rewards some dyes.
This is to bring trimmed armour as rares into the game.
Another quest gives u the legends cape.
Others that ive done already give u small rewards like money or some items.
I have 12 quests right now (hidden and unhidden)
Ill add 13 more.

[size=10pt]Other things I did:[/size]
Adding more shops
Added like 150 more npcs
Fixed some client problemsâ€¦again
Started fishing base (I removed the old one since it was crap)
Started Fletching
Worked farder on slayer
Upgraded thieving

[size=12pt]To do:[/size]
Currently finishing all the quest, will still keep me a week busy
After that making all the skills work.
Adding more shops
More npcs
Usage of more areas and citys
funpk
donator system and stuff
random events
thinking about a hidden skill also
thats all I can remember right now

If u want to see my v1.2 to see more I did: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517647.0.html
v1.3 (also added at the top) for my beginner tutorial video and full cooking: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,517951.0.html

[size=10pt]Credits:[/size]
Delta (for the delta base.)
iSkape (ripped base for a part.)
Me (doing a lot a lot of stuff.)
Rotne (creativity and ideas for my quests.)

Read full topic
